name: Mogul Ale
description:
Mogul is a complex blend of 5 malts and 7 hops. This years Mogul (12/05) will only get better with time...its a hedonistic mouthful with layers of rich malt and tremendous bitterness. A quote from John "more hops" Maier, "Keep Warm, Drink Mogul ~ Prost!" This batch of Mogul was brewed with Pale, Munich, Dark caramunich, Melanoidin, and Amber malts. 
Moguls hops include Newport, Amarillo, Chinook, Horizon, Cascade, Centennial and Crystal...and Mogul (12/05) is dry-hopped with Amarillo and Centennial at the rate of 1 pound per barrel! Oh Hoppy Day!
